price: 17. Y a quienes sigan la guía, Al-lah les aumentará la fe y les inspirará obrar con piedad (temiendo Su castigo).
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ زَادَهُمۡ هُدٗى وَءَاتَىٰهُمۡ تَقۡوَىٰهُمۡ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna ih'tadaw zādahum hudan waātāhum taqwāhum
